body: Sometimes you regret the conflict, but other times you feel as if you didn't have a choice in the matter or that you made the right decision. Most of the time, you just avoid thinking about the conflict. Only you and maybe a select few people know of your involvement.
name: Mixed Feelings
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 3-Moral Conflicts/Relationships/and Drawbacks/Resolution/Mixed Feelings
